entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
